sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react" import { ProductType } from "../types" type IProps = { product: ProductType } const Product = (props: IProps) => { const { product } = props const [modale, setModale] = useState(false) if (!product.isAvailable || product.quantity <= 0) return null return ( <>

{product.name}

{product.price}$

{product.description}

{product.has_to_be_consumed}

) } export default Product
